TITLE: Importing cypress-mailhog in Cypress commands file
DESCRIPTION: Code snippet showing how to include the cypress-mailhog package in the Cypress commands file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// cypress/support/commands
import 'cypress-mailhog';
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring MailHog URL in Cypress config
DESCRIPTION: TypeScript code snippet demonstrating how to add the MailHog base URL to the Cypress configuration file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
export default defineConfig({
  projectId: "****",
  env: {
    mailHogUrl: "http://localhost:8090/",
  },
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing cypress-mailhog package
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install the cypress-mailhog package using npm, yarn, or pnpm package managers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# npm
npm install --save-dev cypress-mailhog

# yarn
yarn add --dev cypress-mailhog

# pnpm
pnpm add -D cypress-mailhog
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring MailHog authentication in Cypress
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration snippets for setting up MailHog authentication using either an auth object or separate username and password fields.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  ...
  "mailHogAuth": {"user": "mailhog username", "pass": "mailhog password"}
}
```

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  ...
  "mailHogUsername": "mailhog username",
  "mailHogPassword": "mailhog password"
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhWaitForMails Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhWaitForMails command to wait for a specific number of emails before proceeding with further actions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_23

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// this waits until there are at least 10 mails on MailHog
cy
  .mhWaitForMails(9)
  .mhGetAllMails()
  .mhFilterBySender("sender-10@example.com")
  .should("have.length", 1);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhGetAllMails Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhGetAllMails command to retrieve all emails from MailHog and assert the number of emails.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetAllMails()
  .should('have.length', 1);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhSearchMails Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhSearchMails command to search for emails in MailHog based on various criteria.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhSearchMails('containing', 'My favorite subject')
  .should('have.length', 1)
  .mhFirst();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhGetBody Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhGetBody command to retrieve and assert the body content of an email.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_16

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetAllMails()
  .should('have.length', 1)
  .mhFirst()
  .mhGetBody()
  .should('contain', 'Part of the Message Body');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Chaining multiple filter commands in Cypress
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example demonstrating how to chain multiple filter commands to create complex email filtering logic.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetAllMails()
  .mhFilterBySubject('My Subject')
  .mhFilterByRecipient('recipient@example.com')
  .mhFilterBySender('sender@example.com')
  .should('have.length', 1);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhHasMailWithSubject Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhHasMailWithSubject command to assert the presence of an email with a specific subject.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_20

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy.mhHasMailWithSubject('My Subject');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhHasMailFrom Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhHasMailFrom command to assert the presence of an email from a specific sender.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_21

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy.mhHasMailFrom('sender@example.com');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhHasMailTo Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhHasMailTo command to assert the presence of an email to a specific recipient.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_22

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy.mhHasMailTo('recipient@example.com');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhGetSubject Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhGetSubject command to retrieve and assert the subject of an email.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetAllMails()
  .should('have.length', 1)
  .mhFirst()
  .mhGetSubject()
  .should('eq', 'My Mails Subject');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhGetMailsBySubject Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhGetMailsBySubject command to fetch emails with a specific subject from MailHog.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetMailsBySubject('My Subject')
  .should('have.length', 1);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhGetMailsBySender Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhGetMailsBySender command to retrieve emails from a specific sender in MailHog.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetMailsBySender('sender@example.com')
  .should('have.length', 1);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhGetMailsByRecipient Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhGetMailsByRecipient command to fetch emails for a specific recipient from MailHog.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetMailsByRecipient('recipient@example.com')
  .should('have.length', 1);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhDeleteAll Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhDeleteAll command to delete all stored emails from MailHog.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy.mhDeleteAll();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhFilterBySubject Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhFilterBySubject command to filter emails by subject from a collection of emails.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetMailsBySender('sender@example.com')
  .mhFilterBySubject('My Subject')
  .should('have.length', 1);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhFilterByRecipient Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhFilterByRecipient command to filter emails by recipient from a collection of emails.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetMailsBySender('sender@example.com')
  .mhFilterByRecipient('recipient@example.com')
  .should('have.length', 1);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhFilterBySender Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhFilterBySender command to filter emails by sender from a collection of emails.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetMailsByRecipient('recipient@example.com')
  .mhFilterBySender('sender@example.com')
  .should('have.length', 1);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhGetSender Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhGetSender command to retrieve and assert the sender of an email.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_17

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetAllMails()
  .should('have.length', 1)
  .mhFirst()
  .mhGetSender()
  .should('eq', 'sender@example.com');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhGetRecipients Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhGetRecipients command to retrieve and assert the recipients of an email.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_18

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetAllMails()
  .should('have.length', 1)
  .mhFirst()
  .mhGetRecipients()
  .should('contain', 'recipient@example.com');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhGetAttachments Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhGetAttachments command to retrieve and assert the attachments of an email.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_19

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetAllMails()
  .should('have.length', 1)
  .mhFirst()
  .mhGetAttachments()
  .should('have.length', 2)
  .should('include', 'sample.pdf');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhFirst Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhFirst command to select the first email from a collection of emails retrieved from MailHog.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetAllMails()
  .should('have.length', 1)
  .mhFirst();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhGetJimMode Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhGetJimMode command to check if Jim chaos monkey is enabled or disabled.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_24

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhGetJimMode()
  .should('eq', true);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using mhSetJimMode Cypress command
DESCRIPTION: JavaScript example of using the mhSetJimMode command to enable or disable Jim chaos monkey and verify its status.
SOURCE: https://github.com/smenigat/cypress-mailhog/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_25

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy
  .mhSetJimMode(true)
  .mhGetJimMode()
  .should('eq', true);
```
